title: Adelic C*-correspondences and parabolic induction
authors: Magnus Goffeng, Bram Mesland, Mehmet Haluk Sengun
abstract:
In analogy with the construction of representations of adelic groups as
restricted products of representations of local groups, we study restricted
tensor products of Hilbert C*-modules and of C*-correspondences. The
construction produces global C*-correspondences from compatible collections of
local C*-correspondences. When applied to the collection of C*-correspondences
capturing local parabolic induction, the construction produces a global
C*-correspondence that captures adelic parabolic induction.
